headline: Kinder Morgan Announces 2026 Financial Expectations
summary: HOUSTON, December 08, 2025--Kinder Morgan, Inc. (NYSE: KMI) today announced its preliminary 2026 financial projections.

headline: Here's Why Still Holding Pembina Pipeline Stock Is Justified
summary: PBA boasts strong financials, long-term contracts and growth in LNG, but faces risks from underperformance, execution challenges and limited near-term cash flow.
